song_name: She Only Smokes When She Drinks
lyrics:
6 contributorsshe only smokes when she drinks lyricsso you lit her cigarette

most girls you probably would
yeah this is that kind of place
but she aint that kind of girl

she only smokes when she drinks

for a complicated girl
she aint that hard to figure out

of being let down by men

and she only smokes when she drinks

now and then when shes tired
of being let down by men
